name: Ultramarine RS 07
description: Ultramarine RS 07 is a medium tinting strength, red shade Ultramarine blue. It is heat fast, Light fast, easy to disperse and approved worldwide for use in sensitive applications such as food contact plastics and cosmetics.Ultramarine RS 07 is widely used alone to obtain a bright, transparent shade of blue, or in combination with other pigments such as titanium dioxide, with which it gives an attractive pastel shade.Ultramarine RS 07 is intended as a general purpose pigment with applicationsin paint, ink, soap, cosmetics and many other industries. Ultramarine RS 07 can be used in plastics.
